Title: Dark Sand

----

Text: Relating to Multi-User Domain games (MMORPG ancestor), Dark Sand is a textual and visual retranscription of those games, between  medieval imageries and bitmap compression. Risograph printing in five colors including two fluorescent colours.

----

Year: 2013

----

Client: Bronze Age

----

Projecttype1: Editorial

----

Projecttype2: 

----

Text2:
